ai-tika-abh07t8:151_3: As to the cool breeze and falling in the sky on the ground, etc., that is to say: because it has an abiding to the ground.
ai-tika-abh07t8:151_4: For the other such things as: “Forget,” etc., in the way beginning, “What is why, what is it pervading? ” etc., doing so with cold and heat, when it is wroped in a cool cold, etc., the contradiction of the cold, and so on.
ai-tika-abh07t8:151_5: ‘What if in the Brahmā world does not apply when it is a form’s application and the cool water.
ai-tika-abh07t8:151_6: And although there is no place for ordination, yet there is no place where the resentment is found, yet there is no fixed destiny, made of rebirth in the various forms or in the realm of luminous form.
ai-tika-abh07t8:152_0: From the top of existence they transmigrate through birth and death, or with the end of craving, which has nothing left over, that is born in them.
